name: 林哲宇
objective:
瞭解原子結構乃是起碼的科技素養，本課程主要的目的是建立學生將來可以以 X 光作為研究工具的能力。本課程主要可分成四部份：
1. 結晶學原理
2. X 光繞射的原理
3. X 光繞射的基本應用
4. 材料的結構分析
除此之外，並將進行一小部份實驗以及文獻回顧報告驗證學理，
同學可從實驗及文獻回顧中學習檢驗製程中材料所發生的現象，從而解決製造的問題。
schedule:
Week 1: Opening of the present lecture
Week 2-3: Basics of crystallography
Week 4-5: Introduction to X-ray techniques
Week 5-6: Application of X-ray techniques
Week 7-8: Material analysis by using X-ray techniques
Week 9: Midterm exam
Week 10-16: Student report session
Week 17: Conclusion and remark
Week 18: Final literature report
scorePolicy:
Midterm exam (25%)
Literature review presentation (25%)
Final paper report (20%)
Attendance (30%)
materials: Elements of X-Ray Diffraction 3rd Edition, B.D. Cullity and S.R. Stock, Pearson (2013).
